description: Accounts contain information about billing for services, while coverages contain information about insurance payors, benefits, subscribers, and members. This table contains one row for each account record in your system.

columns.name: ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the guarantor record. This ID number may be encrypted if you have elected to use enterprise reporting�s security utility.

columns.name: ACCOUNT_NAME
columns.description: This column stores the name for the guarantor record. The name could be hidden if you have elected to use enterprise reporting�s security utility.

columns.name: CONTACT_PERSON
columns.description: The name of the person to contact for questions regarding the guarantor. This item could be hidden.

columns.name: BIRTHDATE
columns.description: The guarantor's date of birth.

columns.name: SEX
columns.description:
The sex of the guarantor. This is extracted as the category abbreviation.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Female


Male


Unknown


Nonbinary


X


Other

columns.name: IS_ACTIVE
columns.description:
This column indicates whether the guarantor was active at the time of the extract.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: CITY
columns.description: The city in which the guarantor lives.

columns.name: STATE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value of the state in which the guarantor lives.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ZIP
columns.description: The ZIP Code area in which the guarantor lives.

columns.name: HOME_PHONE
columns.description: The guarantor�s home phone number (may contain dashes).

columns.name: WORK_PHONE
columns.description: The guarantor�s work phone number (may contain dashes).

columns.name: ACCOUNT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Category value associated with the type of account, such as Personal/Family, Worker�s Comp, etc.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Other


Personal/Family


Non-employed CRNA


Case Rate


Clearing Account


Trust Account


ROI Requester


Invalid

columns.name: REFERRING_PROV_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the referral source for this guarantor.

columns.name: REFERRING_PROV_ID_REFERRING_PROV_NAM
columns.description: The name of the referral source.

columns.name: SERV_AREA_ID
columns.description: The ID of the service area (EAF .1) to which this account belongs.

columns.name: FIN_CLASS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value of the primary financial class of the guarantor (i.e. commercial, Medicare, self-pay, etc.)


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Commercial


Medicare


Medicaid


Self-Pay


Worker's Comp


Tricare


Champva


Group Health Plan


FECA Black Lung


Blue Shield


Medigap


Other


DK Regional


Client

columns.name: TOTAL_BALANCE
columns.description: The total outstanding balance on the account as of the time of the extract.

columns.name: INSURANCE_BALANCE
columns.description: The amount of the insurance balance on the guarantor as of the time of the extract.

columns.name: PATIENT_BALANCE
columns.description: The amount of the self-pay balance on the account as of the time of the extract.

columns.name: BILLING_CYCLE_C
columns.description:
The category value associated with the billing cycle to which the guarantor belongs.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: BILLING_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value for the billing status used for handling statements for this guarantor, such as Age and Hold Statements, Age and Send Statements, Don�t Age and Hold Statements, and so on.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Age & Send Stmts


Age & Hold Stmts


Don't Age & Send Stmts


Don't Age & Hold Stmts

columns.name: PMT_PLAN_AMOUNT
columns.description: The dollar amount to be paid per period if a payment plan has been established for this account.

columns.name: PMT_PLAN_STRT_DATE
columns.description: This column stores the date when the payment plan becomes effective. This column will only be populated if the guarantor is on a payment plan.

columns.name: PMT_PLAN_DUE_DATE
columns.description: The day of the month when the payment plan amount is due if the account is on a payment plan.

columns.name: LAST_INS_PMT_DATE
columns.description: The date the most recent insurance payment was received for this account before the enterprise reporting extract.

columns.name: LAST_PAT_PMT_DATE
columns.description: The date the most recent patient payment was received for this account before the enterprise reporting extract.

columns.name: LAST_PAT_PMT_AMT
columns.description: The amount of the most recent patient payment received for this account before the enterprise reporting extract.

columns.name: LAST_STMT_DATE
columns.description: The date the most recent patient statement was sent for the account.

columns.name: CONTRACT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the pricing contract that was set up with the guarantor.

columns.name: CONTRACT_EXP_DATE
columns.description: The date on which the contract attached to this guarantor expires.

columns.name: COLLECTOR_USER_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the system user who is the collector assigned to this guarantor. This ID may be encrypted if you have elected to use enterprise reporting�s security utility.

columns.name: EPIC_ACCT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the guarantor record. This field will be hidden in a public view of the ACCOUNT table.

columns.name: RESEARCH_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the research study or client record for this guarantor.

columns.name: OCCUPATION
columns.description: The occupation of the guarantor.

columns.name: UNDIST_PMT_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the account has any undistributed payments.  Y indicates the account has some undistributed payments.  A null value indicates the account has no undistributed payments.  An N will not be populated for this column.

columns.name: CREDIT_BALANCE_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the guarantor has credit balance.  Y indicates the guarantor has credit balance.  A null value indicates the guarantor has no credit balance.  An N will not be populated for this column.

columns.name: PP_AMOUNT_DUE
columns.description: The Hospital Billing Payment Plan current amount due.

columns.name: PP_CUR_BALANCE
columns.description: The Hospital Billing Payment Plan current balance.

columns.name: EB_LAST_ND_STMT_DT
columns.description: Last non-demand enterprise statement date.

columns.name: EB_LAST_D_STMT_DT
columns.description: Last demand enterprise statement date.

columns.name: HOM_CLARITY_FLG_YN
columns.description: This column indicates whether the guarantor should be extracted. If the guarantor is homed it will be extracted, otherwise not: 1-extract, 0-do not extract.

columns.name: HB_BALANCE
columns.description: This value is the Hospital Billing balance on the guarantor.

columns.name: HB_PREBILL_BALANCE
columns.description: This value is the Hospital Billing prebilled balance on the account.

columns.name: HB_INSURANCE_BALAN
columns.description: This value is the Hospital Billing insurance balance on the guarantor, but excludes hospital accounts in external AR or bad debt.

columns.name: HB_SELFPAY_BALANCE
columns.description: This value is the Hospital Billing self-pay balance on the account, but excludes hospital accounts in external AR or bad debt.

columns.name: HB_BADDEBT_BALANCE
columns.description: This value is the Hospital Billing bad debt balance on the guarantor.

columns.name: HB_UNDISTRIB_BAL
columns.description: This value is the Hospital Billing undistributed balance on the account, but excludes hospital accounts in external AR or bad debt.

columns.name: HB_SP_AGING_DATE
columns.description: Oldest Self-pay aging date.

columns.name: HB_INS_AGING_DATE
columns.description: This column stores the hospital billing insurance aging date.

columns.name: HB_LAST_INS_PMT_DT
columns.description: This column stores the last hospital billing insurance payment date.

columns.name: HB_LAST_SP_PMT_DT
columns.description: This column stores the last hospital billing self-pay payment date.

columns.name: SBO_HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the default hospital account of the guarantor. The item is only used in single billing office mode.

columns.name: EB_LAST_INFO_ST_DT
columns.description: This column stores the date the last enterprise non-demand informational statement was generated. Informational statements are those with no self-pay balance for the guarantor.

columns.name: EB_LAST_D_INFO_DT
columns.description: This column stores the date the last enterprise demand informational statement was generated. Informational statements are those with no self-pay balance for the guarantor.

columns.name: GUAR_REHOMED_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether a new guarantor was created as a result of running the rehoming report and performing the rehome account action.  Y indicates a new guarantor was created as a result of running the rehoming report and performing the rehome account action.  An N will not be populated for this column.  This item will only be populated if the guarantor is rehomed.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: OLD_REHOMED_ID
columns.description: Holds a pointer from the new guarantor to the old guarantor

columns.name: EMPR_ID_CMT
columns.description: A free text comment that can be entered when the value that is considered to be "Other" is selected as the employer. This option is available only if your organization has chosen to link the account employer to the Employer (EEP) master file in the Facility Profile.

columns.name: PAT_REC_OF_GUAR_ID
columns.description: If the guarantor is the same person as a patient, this item contains the patient ID.

columns.name: HOUSE_NUM
columns.description: This column stores the house number for the guarantor's address.

columns.name: NXT_STM_DATE
columns.description: Specifies the next statement date on the client account

columns.name: CLNT_BILL_FRQNCY_C_NAME
columns.description:
Specifies the statement frequency for this guarantor.  Available options are weekly, monthly, bi-weekly, or weekly and end-of-month.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Monthly


Weekly


Bi-Weekly


Weekly and End of Month

columns.name: CLNT_BILL_DAY_C_NAME
columns.description:
Specifies the day of the week to generate the client bill on provided that CLNT_BILL_FRQNCY_C is set to weekly or biweekly.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Sunday


Monday


Tuesday


Wednesday


Thursday


Friday


Saturday

columns.name: CLNT_BILL_DT_MNTH
columns.description: Specifies the day of the month to bill the client on provided that CLNT_BILL_FRQNCY_C is set to monthly.

columns.name: CLIENT_ACCOUNT_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether or not this is a client guarantor.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: GUAR_REHOMED_YN

columns.name: PMT_PLAN_DURATION
columns.description: The payment plan duration in months.

columns.name: PMT_PLAN_TOTAL_AMT
columns.description: The payment plan total amount.

columns.name: PMT_PLAN_ON_TIME_YN
columns.description:
Whether payment plan is on time, "Y" for on time, "N" for not on time.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: PMT_PLAN_BAL_PD_YN
columns.description:
This column indicates whether the payment plan will be effective until the balance is paid off that is, the payment plan remains effective if new charges occur. This column will only be populated if there is a payment plan.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: PMT_PLAN_LNKSTMT_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the payment plan due day is linked to the statement day.  Y indicates the payment plan due day is linked to the statement day.  This column will only be populated if there is a payment plan.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PMT_PLAN_BAL_PD_YN

columns.name: RQG_RELATIONSHIP_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column stores the unique identifier for the guarantor's relationship to the�requisition grouper patient record.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Aunt


Brother


Daughter


Father


Friend


Granddaughter


Grandfather


Grandmother


Grandson


Legal Guardian


Mother


Other


Step Father


Sister


Self


Step Mother


Son


Spouse


Uncle


Employer


Unverified Proxy


Transplant Recipient

columns.name: HB_BD_SELFPAY_BAL
columns.description: This column stores the total of all self-pay buckets for this guarantor's hospital accounts that are in bad debt when using account-based bad debt.

columns.name: HB_BD_INSURANCE_BAL
columns.description: This column stores the total of all insurance buckets for this guarantor's hospital accounts that are in bad debt when using account-based bad debt.

columns.name: HB_BD_UNDISTRIB_BAL
columns.description: This column stores the total of all undistributed buckets for this guarantor's hospital accounts that are in bad debt when using account-based bad debt.

columns.name: COUNTY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number for the county of the guarantor's billing address.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: COUNTRY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number for the country of the guarantor's billing address.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: EMPY_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number for the guarantor's employment status.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Full Time


Part Time


Not Employed


Self Employed


Retired


On Active Military Duty


Student - Full Time


Student - Part Time


Unknown

columns.name: GUAR_EMPR_CITY
columns.description: The city of the guarantor's employer.

columns.name: GUAR_EMPR_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number for the state of the guarantor's employer.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: STATE_C_NAME

columns.name: GUAR_EMPR_ZIP
columns.description: The ZIP code of the guarantor's employer.

columns.name: GUAR_EMP_CNTRY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number for the country of the guarantor's employer.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: COUNTRY_C_NAME

columns.name: INCOME_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Income source.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: LANGUAGE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value for the preferred language of the guarantor.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: HB_LAST_STMT_DATE
columns.description: This column contains the date of the last statement sent to the guarantor.

columns.name: HB_NEXT_STMT_DATE
columns.description: This column contains the date of the next statement to be sent to the guarantor.

columns.name: HB_LAST_DEMAND_DATE
columns.description: This column contains the date of the last demand statement to be sent to the guarantor.

columns.name: HB_BILL_NOTE_EXP_DT
columns.description: This column contains the expiration date of the billing note on this guarantor.

columns.name: HB_PP_MONTHLY_DUE
columns.description: This column contains the monthly payment due on a hospital account for a payment plan.

columns.name: HB_PP_CUR_HAR_DUE
columns.description: Current amount due on a hospital account for a payment plan.

columns.name: HB_PP_INIT_HAR_BAL
columns.description: The initial balance on the hospital account when the payment plan starts.

columns.name: GUAR_VERIF_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number of the guarantor verification status.  


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: LAST_VERIF_DT
columns.description: This column contains the date of the last verification of the associated guarantor.

columns.name: NEXT_REVIEW_DT
columns.description: Next date this guarantor's verification should be reviewed.

columns.name: LAST_VERIF_USER_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier of the last user to verify the guarantor.

columns.name: GUAR_EMP_HOUSE_NUM
columns.description: The house number of the guarantor's employer.

columns.name: GUAR_EMPR_DISTR_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number for the district of the guarantor's employer.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: GUAR_VERIF_ID
columns.description: The verification record of the guarantor.

columns.name: CONF_NAM_OF_ASSC_PT
columns.description: This item contains the confidential name of the associated patient, if it exists. This name is used to determine the confidential nature of the guarantor.

columns.name: EXT_BD_SP_BAL
columns.description: This value is the Professional Billing external AR bad debt self-pay balance.

columns.name: EXT_BD_INS_BAL
columns.description: This value is the Professional Billing external AR bad debt insurance balance.

columns.name: PB_EXT_SP_BAL
columns.description: This value is the Professional Billing external AR self-pay balance for the account.

columns.name: PB_EXT_INS_BAL
columns.description: This value is the Professional Billing external AR insurance balance for the account.
